title: Helmetlok Carabiner Helmet Lock
features: Rubberized T-bar for chin strap loop
Attaches to motorcycle frame, bars, or luggage rack
description: Never worry about leaving your helmet unattended again. The Helmetlok carabiner lock threads through your D-ring chin strap and clips securely to any fixed point on your bike. The 4-digit resettable combination eliminates the need for keys, and the rubberized T-bar protects your strap from abrasion.
